title: Chapter I - ADMINISTRATION OF PROBATION
content:
Chapter I - ADMINISTRATION OF PROBATION
State Regulations

Part 345 - Probation State Aid Block Grant (§ 345.1 to 345.4)

Part 346 - Staff Development (§ 346.1 to 346.11 to 346.13)

Part 347 - Probation Management (§ 347.1 to 347.8 to 347.9)

Part 348 - Case Record Management (§ 348.1 to 348.7)

Part 349 - Interstate And Intrastate Transfer Of Probation Supervision For Adults And Juveniles (§ 349.1 to 349.7)

Part 350 - Investigations And Reports (§ 350.1 to 350.14)

Part 351 - Probation Supervision (§ 351.1 to 351.11)

Part 352 - Graduated Responses (§ 352.1 to 352.10)

Part 353 - Financial Obligations (§ 353.1 to 353.4)

Part 354 - Intake (§ 354.1 to 354.9)

Part 355 - Probation Officers As Peace Officers (§ 355.1 to 355.8 to 355.10)

Part 356 - Probation Services for Article 3 Juvenile Delinquency (JD) (§ 356.1 to 356.14)

Part 357 - INTAKE FOR ARTICLE 7 (§ 357.1 to 357.13)

Part 358 - Handling Of Ignition Interlock Cases Involving Certain Criminal Offenders (§ 358.1 to 358.10)

Part 359 - Role of Probation in Youth Part of the Superior Court (§ 359.1 to 359.10)

Part 360 - Waivers (§ 360.1 to 360.4 to 360.8)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
